About Us

Discover the real Darjeeling with a stay at our cozy home near Gorkha Stadium in Lebong. Our location offers breathtaking mountain views and pleasant weather, making it the perfect retreat for those seeking a peaceful escape from the busy market area.

At our home, we take pride in serving our guests with special hand-made Darjeeling tea, adding an authentic touch to your experience. We also provide free Wi-Fi. Home made nepali thali for lunch/dinner on request . Choose us for a unique and tranquil getaway that lets you soak in the beauty of Darjeeling while staying connected to the world.

More

What Our Clients Say

Celina

Sahil and his family opened their home in August 2021. They immediately put us at ease. It is a ray of sunshine, warm, friendly, caring, super responsive and very professional. He has solutions for everything. The view from the terrace is breathtaking! The food is delicious. Lebong is a peaceful, safe Darjeeling neighborhood and the neighbors are lovely. The 15-minute shared taxi ride from the Market is easy without too much waiting. This place is perfect if you are looking for the warmth of a fireplace away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Loved our stay! You can go there without a second thought.

Arnab

I was looking for a calm place far away from the hustle of the city. Sahil's place perfectly matched my expectations. It was a homely feeling. The warmth of love, delicious foods, friendly nature impressed me a lot. Will surely come back here.

Aparna

This is indeed a quiet nest, away from the bubbling touristy crowd and offers gorgeous views from the rooftop terrace. Sahil and his family are wonderful and kind beings. I got sick during my stay and they helped me a lot for which I am thankfull. Make sure to enjoy the home-cooked meal by Sahil's mom, its simply amazing. My parents are very picky when it comes to food and they just loved it! Had a great time chitchating with the entire family. Oh and the highlight of our stay is definitely the super-friendly adorable furry pupper🐾

Chandra

Sahil and his family have been extremely warm and hospitable. You’ll not feel you’re meeting any strangers. They’ll make you feel at home. From the moment you enter to the moment you exit, you’ll be attended to very well and given special attention. Sahil shared his numerous travel experiences and shared a lot about his culture and traditions. It is a very laid back place and the host is very flexible.If you want a place that is peaceful and away from the city hustle bustle, this is a perfect place. The food cooked by Aunty(Sahil’s mother) was very tasty. You’ll not miss home food at all. When you leave, they perform a very touching gesture of handing you a white traditional cloth and give good wishes and blessings for your future. The price point at which this experience came was worth more than every penny!!!

Deep

I have stayed here for one month. It was one of the greatest experience I witnessed in my life. Everyone in the family is very nice. It has become my family for that entire month. That place itself is very beautiful and you will get all kind of facilities there. I am already missing them. Will go back again and again.
